djroink as the post below said these are shown on friday night 1 week bfore in the USA.similar thing happenin on that new series wilfred(about the dog with elijah wood) were way behind but usa is up to episode 10.This torchwood was financed by the usa not bbc wales,so they want first showing,there is a logo on screen as it starts,or in end credits that shows the affiliates name anyway,cheers
